SEARCH
Package io.github.jy95.fds.common.types

Class DosageAPI<C extends FDSConfig,D>

java.lang.Object
io.github.jy95.fds.common.types.DosageAPI<C,D>
Type Parameters:
C - the type of configuration extending FDSConfig
D - the type of dosage handled by this API
public abstract class DosageAPI<C extends FDSConfig,D> extends Object
Abstract class providing API methods for translating and formatting dosage data.
Author:
jy95

  • Method Details

    • getFields

      public CompletableFuture<String> getFields(D dosage, DisplayOrder... fields)
      Converts specified dosage fields into a human-readable string representation asynchronously.
      Parameters:
      dosage - the dosage object to translate
      fields - the fields to include in the translation
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture with the combined human-readable string

    • getTranslator

      public abstract Translator<C,D> getTranslator(DisplayOrder displayOrder)
      Retrieves the translator associated with the specified display order.
      Parameters:
      displayOrder - the display order used to find the translator
      Returns:
      the corresponding Translator, or null if not found

    • containsOnlySequentialInstructions

      public abstract boolean containsOnlySequentialInstructions(List<D> dosages)
      Checks if the given list of dosages contains only sequential instructions.
      Parameters:
      dosages - the list of dosages to check
      Returns:
      true if all dosages are sequential, false otherwise

    • asHumanReadableText

      public CompletableFuture<String> asHumanReadableText(D dosage)
      Converts a single dosage object into human-readable text asynchronously.
      Parameters:
      dosage - the dosage object to translate
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture with the human-readable string

    • asHumanReadableText

      public CompletableFuture<String> asHumanReadableText(List<D> dosages)
      Converts a list of dosage objects into human-readable text asynchronously. Handles both sequential and grouped dosages appropriately.
      Parameters:
      dosages - the list of dosage objects to translate
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture with the combined human-readable string

    • convertSequentialDosagesToText

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture with the human-readable string
